QuestData.Title: Shrouds of the Scourge
QuestData.Description: To the northeast looms the Temple City of En'kilah, the Scourge's seat in Borean Tundra. From behind its walls, the Scourge commander has sent his Nerubians to surround us.$B$BRemaining on the defensive would doom my people, but my advisors differ in their strategies. Durm would charge in blindly, while Sage Aeire favors stealth.$B$BThe Temple City has blighted the nearby lands and the native creatures. Aeire believes the pelts of the scourged mammoths can serve as a cloak that may hide an infiltrator.
QuestData.LogDescription: Chieftain Wintergale at Taunka'le Village wants you to bring him 5 Scourged Mammoth Pelts.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you brought the mammoth pelts?
QuestData.RewardText: As much as I dislike bringing such disease-ridden things into the village, they may give us an advantage over our foes.$B$B<The chieftain gestures to Sage Aeire and waves dismissively at the pelts.>$B$BWhile she is preparing the pelts, there is one other element we need to create the cloak.
